languages.text: "Никуда не разбегусь. Обещаю!" {n}Рыжеволосая решительно берет молодого солдата под локоть.{/n} "Хорошо, когда есть кто-то, кто тебя защитит и выведет..."
"I won't run off. I promise!" {n}The red-haired woman hooks her arm through the soldier's resolutely.{/n} "It's so good to have someone who'll protect you and take you to safety..."
languages.original_text: "Никуда не разбегусь. Обещаю!" {n}Рыжеволосая решительно берет молодого солдата под локоть.{/n} "Хорошо, когда есть кто-то, кто тебя защитит и выведет..."

traits.locale_text: "I won't scatter. I promise!" {n}The red-haired woman hooks her arm through the soldier's resolutely.{/n} "So good to have someone who'll protect you and take you to safety..."

"I won't run off. I promise!" {n}The red-haired woman hooks her arm through the soldier's resolutely.{/n} "It's so good to have someone who'll protect you and take you to safety..."

languages.text: "Ich zerstreue mich nicht. Versprochen!" {n}Die rothaarige Frau hakt sich resolut unter dem Arm des Soldaten ein.{/n} "Wie schön, jemanden zu haben, der einen beschützt und in Sicherheit bringt ..."
languages.original_text: "I won't run off. I promise!" {n}The red-haired woman hooks her arm through the soldier's resolutely.{/n} "It's so good to have someone who'll protect you and take you to safety..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich zerstreue mich nicht. Versprochen!" {n}Die rothaarige Frau hakt sich resolut unter dem Arm des Soldaten ein.{/n} "Wie schön, jemanden zu haben, der einen beschützt und in Sicherheit bringt ..."

languages.text: « Je ne vais pas m'éloigner, promis ! » {n}crie la femme rousse en s'accrochant résolument au bras du soldat.{/n} « C'est si bon d'avoir quelqu'un pour vous protéger et vous emmener en lieu sûr... »
languages.original_text: "I won't run off. I promise!" {n}The red-haired woman hooks her arm through the soldier's resolutely.{/n} "It's so good to have someone who'll protect you and take you to safety..."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne vais pas m'éloigner, promis ! » {n}crie la femme rousse en s'accrochant résolument au bras du soldat.{/n} « C'est si bon d'avoir quelqu'un pour vous protéger et vous emmener en lieu sûr... »

languages.text: “我绝不会走散，我保证！”{n}红发女人坚定地挽住了科米尔的胳膊。{/n}“知道有人会保护你，会带你去安全的地方，这样的感觉真不错……”
languages.original_text: "I won't run off. I promise!" {n}The red-haired woman hooks her arm through the soldier's resolutely.{/n} "It's so good to have someone who'll protect you and take you to safety..."

traits.locale_text: “我绝不会走散，我保证！”{n}红发女人坚定地挽住了科米尔的胳膊。{/n}“知道有人会保护你，会带你去安全的地方，这样的感觉真不错……”

languages.text: 「私は逃げないから。約束するわ！」{n}赤毛の女性は兵士の腕をしっかりと引っ掛けた。{/n}「身を守り、安全な場所に連れて行ってくれる人がいるのは素晴らしいことね…」
languages.original_text: "I won't run off. I promise!" {n}The red-haired woman hooks her arm through the soldier's resolutely.{/n} "It's so good to have someone who'll protect you and take you to safety..."

traits.locale_text: 「私は逃げないから。約束するわ！」{n}赤毛の女性は兵士の腕をしっかりと引っ掛けた。{/n}「身を守り、安全な場所に連れて行ってくれる人がいるのは素晴らしいことね…」

languages.text: «No me separaré. ¡Lo prometo!». {n}La mujer pelirroja se agarra al brazo del soldado con decisión.{/n} «Es tan bueno tener a alguien que te proteja y te ponga a salvo...».
languages.original_text: "I won't run off. I promise!" {n}The red-haired woman hooks her arm through the soldier's resolutely.{/n} "It's so good to have someone who'll protect you and take you to safety..."

traits.locale_text: «No me separaré. ¡Lo prometo!». {n}La mujer pelirroja se agarra al brazo del soldado con decisión.{/n} «Es tan bueno tener a alguien que te proteja y te ponga a salvo...».

languages.text: "Söz veriyorum kaçmayacağım!" {n}Kızıl saçlı kadın, kararlı bir şekilde kolunu askerin koluna doluyor.{/n} "Seni koruyacak ve güvene kavuşturacak birinin olması ne güzel."
languages.original_text: "I won't run off. I promise!" {n}The red-haired woman hooks her arm through the soldier's resolutely.{/n} "It's so good to have someone who'll protect you and take you to safety..."
